title: Whirlpool
description: Save the island √ Protect my family √ Study for math test…….Everything was normal for Elizabeth Kamaka. Well, as normal as it could be for a famous superhero.That was, until a figure from her past showed up and shook up her world.With her team by her side, she now must figure out how to stop this villain without anyone finding out her true identity, AND how to keep up with her homework. After all, why should her schoolwork have to suffer?With her family’s lives on the line, will she crack under pressure? Or will she be able to stand up to the skeletons in her closet?Scroll up and click Buy Now to join Whirlpool in her rapid tale.
author: Rachel E. Taylor
